entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
